
Automated Feature Selection (AFS)
=================================

The AFS module provides functionality for reducing the dimensionality of the dataset by selecting the Markov boundary of the target variable.

Main Class
----------

- `AFS <afs.AFS>`_

Available Algorithms
--------------------

- **FBED**
- **SES**

Classes
-------

- `AFS <afs.AFS>`_
- `AFSConfiguration <afs.AFSConfiguration>`_
